messages.subject: Bike Tour at Conference
messages.msgSnippet: Hey folks.  I am looking forward to the conference too!  My husband  is really looking forward to the bike tour of Columbia on Saturday morning.    He collects
messages.messageBody:
Hey folks. I am looking forward to the conference too! My husband is
really looking forward to the bike tour of Columbia on Saturday morning. He
collects vintage lightweight bikes, great for touring and road travel. He has
over 50 bikes! . So, if anyone who is traveling by plane, or has no way of
transporting thier bike, would like to do the bike tour and needs a bike, just
email me and I will bring one for you. We have all sizes, models, you name it..
lol. DH and I will be traveling seperately, he will only be at the
conference on Saturday. We have a two bike racks that will each hold 3 bikes and
also quite a few of the bikes have quick release tires that allow for easier
transportation. Drop me a line and I will be glad to hook you up with a bike!

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
